Hi, Brian. What did you do last weekend?
I went to my cousin's birthday party.
Wow! Did you have a good time there?
Yes, I enjoyed myself at the party.
What did you give her for her birthday?
I made a special card and cookies myself.
I went to the amusement park with my family.
And I saw a woman in a polka-dot dress there.
A woman in a polka-dot dress?
Yes. She was our English teacher!
